body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ ~H = ran(+h)
⊣ 0h =(GId ` +h)
⊣ < +h, .h > ∈ CVecOLD
⊣ (normh : ~H → ℝ)
⊣ ((hs0 ∈ ~H ∧(normh ` hs0)= 0)→ hs0 = 0h)
⊣ ((hs1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 ∈ ~H)→(normh `(hs1[.h]hs0))=((abs ` hs1)[×](normh ` hs0)))
⊣ ((hs0 ∈ ~H ∧ hs1 ∈ ~H)→(normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[≤]((normh ` hs0)[+](normh ` hs1)))
⊣ c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0, ~H)
⊣ d(hs0, +h)
⊣ d(hs0, .h)
⊣ d(hs0, normh)
⊣ d(hs1, ~H)
⊣ d(hs1, +h)
⊣ d(hs1, .h)
⊣ d(hs1, normh)
